name: Reaver (itch) (Friendly_RoboBoy)
description:
Reaver Was Made As A Submission To The 2022 Brackey's Game Jam But Took Slightly Longer Than Expected.

The Premise Of The Game Is To Survive As Long As Possible While Evading Attacks From On Coming Hordes Of Enemies.

Controls :

- A, D To Move Left And Right

- Space To Jump

- Left Shift + Dash Unlocked To Dash

- Space While In Air + Double Jump Unlocked To Double Jump

- Right Click Release + Arrows To Fire An Arrow

- Left Click + W,A,S,D To Swing Sythe In Direction
